overview:
IT Management Consultant to C-Level executives.

Kevin is co-author of the bestselling Visible Ops guide with Gene Kim and George Spafford. He also co-founded the IT Process Institute, an IT management research think tank with Gene Kim and served as its President for many years.

Kevin is continues his work as a thought leader while acting as the CTO at Assemblage Pointe, Inc, his management consulting company.

Currently he works with the CIOs and CTOs of top internet 2.0 and enterprise IT organizations that need to improve IT execution / and operations performance.

Kevin actively blogs at http://blog.kevinbehr.com
